title.rendered: Wysa App: Life coaching AI bot

content.rendered:
Wysa is an AI-enabled Life Coach for mental and emotional wellness. Launched in 2017, the service provides early intervention to high-risk groups through 3 methods: an AI chatbot, a library of evidence-based self-help tools, and messaging-based support from human psychologists. Anonymous, empathetic and available 24×7, Wysa has served 1.3 million people in 30+ countries having had 90+ million conversations so far.

Wysa allows you to:

  • Talk to AI bot: Trained in CBT, our bot is your 4 am friend and helps you overcome the negative thoughts
  • Explore self-help tools: We have a library of scientifically proven tools that help you overcome stress, depression, and anxiety
  • Sleep Better: Explore sleep stories, sleep sounds, and meditations for restful sleep

The Wysa app has been rated by ORCHA with a score of 92%, among the highest in stress and mental wellness, and also across all health app categories; with 100% on clinical assurance.

Find Wysa on the iOS App Store
Find Wysa on Google Play

Wysa is developed by Touchkin e-services Pvt. Ltd.

Pricing info:

We have a Freemium model.

  • AI Bot and a part of Self-help library is completely free and has no cost associated
  • Premium Self-care digital tools can be accessed from as little as $49.99 for an annual package
  • Online therapists can be booked for as little as $50/week for two live chat sessions

Privacy info:

Wysa is a secure platform and we do not store any personal information of the user with us. For the full disclosure, kindly read the privacy policy here:

https://legal.wysa.uk/privacy-policy

Disclaimer:

Wysa is not designed to assist with crises such as abuse, severe mental health conditions that may cause feelings of suicide, harm to self and any other medical emergencies. Wysa cannot and will not offer medical or clinical advice. It can only suggest that users seek advanced and professional medical help.

You must be at least 18 years of age to use Wysa. If you are between 13 and 18 years of age, please read through the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy along with your parents or legal guardian to understand eligibility before use. Wysa is not designed to be used by children under 13.
